channel.title: TestScape
channel.description:
Ok so i need some help on testscape... alot of help, now if you would just bare with me here and maybe get back to me on some of these, i would realllllly appriciate it, Thanks... :)
I need help with: [b]-Woodcut axe, minning pickaxe, etc. required for skill -Making all skills start at 1/1 instead of 1/135 -Making it so it updates, so you dont have to relog for it to show your skill. Ex. i raised 6 attack levels, you have to relog to make it show 6/135[/b]
Ok thats about it... so plz help, i would appriciate it, theres not that much there, but i dont know how difficult it is, Thanks!!!
[i][b]Merry Christmas!!![/b][/i] :D

item.title: TestScape
item.dc:creator: @Hell_Hound_0516 Hell Hound 0516
item.description:
@Hell_Hound_0516 wrote:

Ok so i need some help on testscape… alot of help, now if you would just bare with me here and maybe get back to me on some of these, i would realllllly appriciate it, Thanks…

I need help with:
-Woodcut axe, minning pickaxe, etc. required for skill
-Making all skills start at 1/1 instead of 1/135
-Making it so it updates, so you dont have to relog for it to show your skill. Ex. i raised 6 attack levels, you have to relog to make it show 6/135

Ok thats about it… so plz help, i would appriciate it, theres not that much there, but i dont know how difficult it is, Thanks!!!

Merry Christmas!!!
